## Description {#details}

This class helps to assign indexes for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> children.

Indexes are used to create type name for children which should be presented in the original order(function parameters, array dimensions, enumeration members, class/structure members).

Definition at line 132 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/synthetictypenamebuilder-h">SyntheticTypeNameBuilder.h</a>.
